department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Minister des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
description: Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) has a requirement for warehouse and moving services.
full_summary:
Title: Warehousing and Moving Services
=====================================

**Tender Reference:**
WS4003331493

**Publication Date:**
May 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:**
June 27, 2023, 14:00 Local Time

**Amendment Number:**
1
**Amendment Date:** 
May 30, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:**
July 11, 2023

**Procurement Category:**
SRV

**Notice Type:**
Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:**
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
None

**Regions of Delivery:**
Iqaluit

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**
Shelley Unser (SPAC/PSPC)
shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: Please do not contact the contractor for tender inquiries. Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys must be used for all tender-related communications.

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16291882?extsite=MTYyOTE4ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**
Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer for warehouse and moving services. The contract duration is 5 years, with delivery point in Iqaluit, Nunavut. Interested contractors should submit their bids by June 27, 2023, at 14:00 Local Time. Late
